topic.title: Installing the Content Fusion Connector Add-on

keywords.indexterm: Installing Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on

body.p:
To use , you must install the Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on in Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author by following these steps:
In Oxygen XML Editor/Author, go to Window Show View and select Content Fusion Task Manager (it can also be found in the Review toolbar, the Review submenu of the contextual menu in Author mode, or in the contextual menu of the DITA Maps Manager view).
If it has not already been installed, a message will appear asking you if you want to install the add-on.
To continue, click Install and follow the on-screen instructions.
Restart Oxygen XML Editor/Author.
Result: Content Fusion Task Manager is now available in the Window Show View menu. Selecting this button/action opens the Content Fusion Task Manager view.
